title: Build a customer support agent with Grok-4, Google Docs, and Telegram [RAG]
description:
ü§ñ Grok-4 Customer Support Agent with Document-Based Intelligence
Template [RAG]

This workflow creates a smart, AI-powered customer support agent using Grok-4 that can answer questions based on a preloaded Google Doc knowledge base. It listens for incoming customer queries via Telegram, then uses Grok-4‚Äôs language reasoning + memory features to generate helpful responses pulled directly from the doc.

Watch the Step-by-Step Tutorial of this Workflow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OXzsh-Ba-8Y&t=2s

It‚Äôs perfect for solopreneurs, startups, or businesses that want to:
Automate first-level support
Build a Telegram-based knowledge agent
Answer FAQs using internal docs (like manuals, policies, product details)

üîç How It Works:
Telegram Trigger ‚Äì Listens for incoming messages from users

Google Docs Tool ‚Äì Retrieves a specified doc to serve as the knowledge base

Grok-4 AI Agent ‚Äì Uses xAI‚Äôs latest LLM with built-in memory and the document as a tool

Memory Buffer ‚Äì Keeps track of ongoing context in the conversation

Telegram Reply ‚Äì Sends the final response back to the customer

üß† Tools & Integrations Used:
xAI Grok-4 Model (via Langchain-compatible node)

Google Docs Tool (as a reference knowledge base)

Telegram Bot API (chat interface)

n8n Agent Framework (for chaining memory, model, and tools)

üí° Use Cases:
AI-powered FAQ assistant for your product

Internal HR bot answering company policy questions

Support assistant trained on onboarding documents or technical manuals

Private support bot for VIP groups on Telegram
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
